model

Class TripCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.TripCollection

  • public class TripCollection
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents collection of all trips and their routes. This class also includes business logic for finding routes in collection of trips.
    Author:
    Milan Sovic

    • Method Detail

      • findAllRoutes

        public void findAllRoutes()
        Finds all routes with two stages and their popularity, in collection of trips. The result is placed in routes attribute.
        We iterate trough collection of trips and do following in each iteration:
        • Find all routes for current trip
        • Iterate trough found routes and check if the current route is contained in a map of routes. If it is contained, we increase the route popularity. On the contrary, we put it in the map and set its popularity to 1.

      • findAllRoutes

        public void findAllRoutes(int minLength)
        Finds all routes with minimum minLength stages and their popularity, in collection of trips. The result is placed in routes attribute.
        We iterate trough collection of trips and do following in each iteration:
        • Find all routes for current trip
        • Iterate trough found routes and check if the current route is contained in a map of routes. If it is contained, we increase the route popularity. On the contrary, we put it in the map and set its popularity to 1.
        Parameters:
        minLength - Minimum number of stages in route

      • findAllRoutes

        public void findAllRoutes(int minLength,
                          java.lang.String destinationName)
        Finds all routes with minimum minLength stages, that includes destinationName destination, and their popularity, in collection of trips. The result is placed in routes attribute.
        We iterate trough collection of trips and do following in each iteration:
        • Find all routes for current trip
        • Iterate trough found routes and check if the current route is contained in a map of routes. If it is contained, we increase the route popularity. On the contrary, we put it in the map and set its popularity to 1.
        Parameters:
        minLength - Minimum number of stages in route
        destinationName - Name of required destination

      • findBestRoute

        public java.util.List<Route> findBestRoute()
        Finds best route in a map of routes and their popularity.
        Firstly, we check for the maximum route popularity of all routes, then we find maximum number of stages in most popular routes, and finally filter only routes with maximum popularity and maximum number of stages.
        Returns:
        List of most popular routes with maximum number of stages.
